name: Dip & Flip
description:
You’re a zombie parent, and your zombie babies are hungry for food loops! Stick food loops on your rotting fingers, and shake them (the food loops) off into your babies’ bowls. But don’t shake too hard, or you’ll shake them (your fingers) into your babies’ bowls.

Controls:

- right mouse: grab some Froot Loops

- left mouse (dragged): throw Froot Loops to bowls of your kids. The more you drag, the more force is added
